author: sky.cactus
content: This was one of the problems with Plasma.  You had to exit within a finite period of time and it is possible that a rush of exits could clog the network so not everyone could exit if that time was too short.

author: sky.cactus
content: ZK Rollups are ideal on this front because there is no time limit on exiting or paying attention.  You can show up years later and still exit, even if the entire system went offline. (assuming you have access to the necessary tooling and data)
